attributes.action: Workers shouldn't have to book their holiday entitlement a year in advance.
attributes.additional_details: More protections for worker holiday entitlement. Managers often threaten workers that, if they do not book time off a year in advance they will lose their holiday entitlement completely. This is an unfair system. Nobody knows what will change in their life 3, 6, 8 months from now - let alone a year!

rejection.details:
Not the Government/Parliament’s responsibility

We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about an individual's holiday entitlement are a matter for their employers, not the UK Government or Parliament.
